name: □ 62 □ Samarium
description:
It was originally made 07-04-18 and is part of a periodic table pack on VJloops //// [ vjloops.com/stock-pack/animated-classic-periodic-table-chemical-elements-orbits-pack-146861.html] ///

Samarium is a silvery-white metal belonging to the lanthanide group of the periodic table. It is relatively stable at room temperature in dry air, but it ignites when heated above 150 C and forms an oxide coating in moist air.

Discovered by: Paul Emile Lecoq de Boisbaud
